model

Class ExtendedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • model.ExtendedImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency

    public class ExtendedImage
extends java.awt.image.BufferedImage
    Image class extending BufferedImage for having preview and thumbnail sized versions.
    Author:
    Edvard H??binette
